Player History
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/2013, off Ryan Webb (MIA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/2013, off Chad Qualls (MIA)...
1/30/2015: Gets a new one-year contract worth $600,000 through salary arbitration...
1/30/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $762,857 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 9/19/2016 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
1/30/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $785,000 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Milwaukee on 2/5/2018 to a 1-year deal worth $15,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/7/2019 to a 3-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Injured on 5/7/2019 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/2019, hitting .406 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Injured on 9/4/2019 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 9/25/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2020, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 9/30/2020...
Traded from Philadelphia to Arizona on 5/11/2021 (Going to PHI: 3B Ernest Rucks. Going to ARI: 1B Juan Francisco)...
Was claimed off waivers by Pittsburgh on 8/20/2021.
Released by Pittsburgh on 10/3/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/5/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Injured on 7/13/2022 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
10/3/2022: Signed a contract extension with Texas, $10,000,000 per year, for 1 years.
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/3/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $1,200,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/3/2026 to a 2-year deal worth $1,849,000 per year...
